summary: This document appears to be an FBI interview summary (302 form) of a witness, referred to as [REDACTED], who was a close friend and former boyfriend of a victim, referred to as [REDACTED]. The witness recounts the victim's disclosures about being sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell at a ranch in New Mexico in the summer of 1996, following a trip to Thailand arranged by Epstein. The witness also describes a later incident in New York where he observed Epstein inappropriately touching the victim.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as a wealthy benefactor who arranged a trip to Thailand for the victim and her sister, and who sexually assaulted the victim at a ranch in New Mexico. Later observed inappropriately touching the victim in New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as charming and well-put-together; picked up the victim in New Mexico, took her shopping, and was present during the massage that led to the sexual assault by Epstein.

persons.name: [REDACTED]
persons.context: The individual being interviewed by the FBI. He is a baker from Arizona, was a close friend and former boyfriend of the victim ([REDACTED]), and recounts her disclosures about the abuse by Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: [REDACTED]
persons.context: The victim who disclosed being sexually assaulted by Epstein and Maxwell at a New Mexico ranch in the summer of 1996. She was an artist from a single-parent family, and Epstein was initially presented as a benefactor of her art.

persons.name: [REDACTED]
persons.context: The younger sister of the victim ([REDACTED]). Epstein learned about her through the victim and offered to help pay for her college education.

connections.description: Acted together in the New Mexico incident where Maxwell facilitated the victim's arrival and set up the massage, after which Epstein assaulted her.
Epstein sexually assaulted the victim ([REDACTED]) during a massage at a New Mexico ranch and later inappropriately touched her during a Broadway show in New York.
Maxwell facilitated the victim's ([REDACTED]) trip to New Mexico, set up the massage, and was present during the initial stages of the assault.
Close friends and former romantic partners who attended neighboring high schools. The victim confided in the witness about the abuse by Epstein and Maxwell.
Epstein was presented as a wealthy benefactor who helped the victim's family, paid for a trip to Thailand for the victim, and offered to pay for her sister's college.

events.title: High School Prom Meeting
events.description: The witness ([REDACTED]) first met the victim ([REDACTED]) at their junior year prom and after-party.

events.title: Thailand Trip
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arranged and paid for a trip to Thailand for the victim ([REDACTED]) shortly after she met the witness.

events.title: New Mexico Ranch Assault
events.description: The victim ([REDACTED]) was taken to a ranch in New Mexico by Ghislaine Maxwell. Under the guise of a massage, she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein, who also got into bed with her afterward.

events.title: Initial Disclosure to Confidant
events.description: The victim ([REDACTED]) first disclosed details of the New Mexico assault to her close friend and confidant ([REDACTED]) during their senior year of high school.

events.title: Emotional Outburst in Iowa City
events.description: While the victim ([REDACTED]) was living in Iowa City, she had an emotional outburst with the witness ([REDACTED]), crying and stating that the feelings from the Epstein incident resurface during physical intimacy.

events.title: New York Broadway Show Incident
events.description: During a trip to New York to see a Broadway show, the witness ([REDACTED]) observed Jeffrey Epstein sitting between him and the victim ([REDACTED]) and inappropriately touching her leg.

keyFacts: A victim ([REDACTED]) disclosed being sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell at a ranch in New Mexico in the summer of 1996, following a trip to Thailand that Epstein arranged.
The assault occurred during a massage where Epstein entered the room unexpectedly, fondled the victim, and later got into bed with her.
Ghislaine Maxwell facilitated the trip, picked up the victim, took her shopping, and was present during the setup of the massage.
A witness and close friend ([REDACTED]) also observed Epstein inappropriately touching the victim's leg during a Broadway show in New York years later.
The victim experienced lasting trauma, with emotional outbursts related to the incident recurring into her adult life, particularly in contexts of physical intimacy.
